name: UnofficialCNN5Things
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Unofficial CNN 5 Things flash briefing skill brings you top 5 stories that will get you up to speed and on with your day. Updates at 6am, 9am, 12pm, 3pm and 6pm Eastern, every weekday.

Enable this skill and add it to your "Flash Briefing" on your Alexa app. Then you can say, “Alexa, what’s my flash briefing” or “Alexa, what’s in the news” to hear your flash briefing.


Disclaimer:: This Alexa flash briefing skill and its Developer are not affiliated with Cable News Network (CNN) company. Thanks to CNN for making their news feed publicly available at https://www.cnn.com/audio/podcasts/5-things
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
